AVSEC Order No.: 10/2015

Subject: - Security Programme for Ground Handling Agencies.

~ In the exercise of powers conferred by Section SA of the Aircraft Act, 1934, delegated
to him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification No. 1797 dated
03/07/1997, for the purpose of securing the aircraft operations, the Commissioner of Security
(CA) directs that the security programme attached with this Order shall be implemented by
all concerned with immediate effect.

2. Any violation of this AVSEC Order shall attract penalty “under Section 11A of the
Aircraft Act 1934.

Encl.: as above

BB. ee

Commissioner of Security (CA)
